Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Sigh! What is this? It's just an empty stage.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'And here I thought some mechanoids would be selling souvenirs here. Isn\'t that what "tourism" is in the books?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'That said... This does look like the stage I used to perform on. Despite the different decorations...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu performs a few somersaults dextrously before ending with a gallant stance.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Sigh. If only there were gongs and drums here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Have you seen the theaters in Kowloong, Commandant? Gongs and drums going crazy and accompanying the actors singing on the stage!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Phew! I haven't seen that in a while. What a shame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Ah, I shouldn't have said something like that here, haha! It's a spring vacation, after all. Should I say something else?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'I remember them singing these songs before...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Changyu's hand spins into the starting gesture of a traditional Chinese opera before starting to sing."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '~"From dream returning, orioles coil their song through all the brilliant riot of the new season..."~', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '~"to listener in tiny leaf-locked court."~', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '~"Like one \'eyeing the apricot flower to slake her thirst\' at dawn, cheeks blurred with last night\'s rouge, I gaze at Apricot Blossom Pass."~', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Hehe! This was a blockbuster back then!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds catchy.', 3: '24', 4: "I don't think I get it.", 5: '25'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Isn't it? I knew you'd appreciate it, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's probably because I'm a bad singer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "After all, I've never been great at playing female roles...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'How I wish I could invite you to a theater as well...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu leans on one leg, seemingly gazing somewhere far away through the simulated sky.'}
{2: "I'm sure we'll get the chance to do it.", 3: '31'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "...Right! We'll definitely get to do it!", 4: '1'}
